Actions.Name: Lookup EAN barcode value, return product data
Actions.Description: Lookup an input EAN barcode and return key details about the product

Actions.Name: Scan and recognize an image of a barcode
Actions.Description: Scan an image or photo of a barcode and return the result.  Supported barcode types include AZTEC, CODABAR, CODE_39, CODE_93, CODE_128, DATA_MATRIX, EAN_8, EAN_13, ITF, MAXICODE, PDF_417, QR_CODE, RSS_14, RSS_EXPANDED, UPC_A, UPC_E, All_1D, UPC_EAN_EXTENSION, MSI, PLESSEY, IMB

Actions.Name: Generate a EAN-13 code barcode as PNG file
Actions.Description: Validates and generate a EAN-13 barcode as a PNG file, a type of 1D barcode

Actions.Name: Generate a EAN-8 code barcode as PNG file
Actions.Description: Validates and generate a EAN-8 barcode as a PNG file, a type of 1D barcode

Actions.Name: Generate a QR code barcode as PNG file
Actions.Description: Generate a QR code barcode as a PNG file, a type of 2D barcode which can encode free-form text information

Actions.Name: Generate a UPC-A code barcode as PNG file
Actions.Description: Validate and generate a UPC-A barcode as a PNG file, a type of 1D barcode

Actions.Name: Generate a UPC-E code barcode as PNG file
Actions.Description: Validates and generate a UPC-E barcode as a PNG file, a type of 1D barcode
